question: Consider the following statements regarding the Pradhan Mantri Anusuchit Jaati Abhyuday Yojana (PM- AJAY) Scheme:  1. It is aimed at reducing poverty among the Scheduled Castes communities through various initiatives.  2. It is a 100% Centrally Sponsored Scheme. Agni-5 missile developed under Make in India project by DRDO. ➢ Agni 5 missile is the longest range missile of the Agni series with a range of over 5000 km.
